/* USE : PosUtilLogMapper.getPosUtilLogList */ SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tppul.UTIL_INS_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS Srch_Date , tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD , tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM , tms.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tppul.USER_NAME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tppul.UTIL_INS_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UTIL_INS_DT , tppul.UTIL_INS_MSG FROM TB_PS_POS_UTIL_LOG tppul , TB_HQ_OFFICE tho , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE 1=1 AND tppul.UTIL_INS_DT BETWEEN #{startDate}||'000000' AND #{endDate}||'235959'
AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeCd}||'%'
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD LIKE '%'||#{storeCd}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_NM LIKE '%'||#{storeNm}||'%'
AND tppul.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD ORDER BY tppul.UTIL_INS_DT
